oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Owl and the Black Crow foretell the approach of the Lion. By Dia!kw in (L V.

4706 1/2, 4696 rev., and 4697 rev.). Parents teach that when the owl screams and acts a certain way it means a lion is coming to take them in their sleep. The black crow also warns of the coming of the lion.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The owl and the black crow
